traits.name: Absorption
entries: When the protean abomination kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead, it absorbs the corpse into its body and regains 20 hit points.

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The protean abomination can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The protean abomination can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The protean abomination makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller target, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15), and the protean abomination uses Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
entries: The protean abomination engulfs a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it. Until the grapple ends the target is {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the abomination's turns or take 19 (3d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the abomination moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The abomination can have only one creature engulfed at a time.
